title: Farcaster Trivia
description: Test your knowledge about the Farcaster protocol and ecosystem

questions.text: Who are the co-founders of Farcaster?
questions.explanation: Dan Romero and Varun Srinivasan co-founded Farcaster after leaving Coinbase.

questions.text: What is the native currency used in Farcaster for onchain actions?
questions.explanation: Warps are used for onchain actions like registrations and storage.

questions.text: Which blockchain does Farcaster use for its onchain registry?
questions.explanation: Farcaster uses Optimism (OP Mainnet) for its onchain contracts.

questions.text: What is a 'cast' in Farcaster terminology?
What is the maximum character limit for a cast?
questions.explanation: Farcaster allows up to 320 characters per cast.

questions.correct: Interactive apps that run inside casts
options: Interactive apps that run inside casts
questions.explanation: Frames are interactive applications that can be embedded in casts.
FID (Farcaster ID) is the unique identifier for each Farcaster account.

questions.text: Which popular Farcaster client is developed by the Farcaster team?
questions.explanation: Warpcast is the official client developed by the Farcaster team.
